Marple - Backend engineer (huge time series algorithms) - On-site (Antwerp, Belgium, 3/d week) - Full-time

Marple ([marpledata.com](https://www.marpledata.com/)) is a startup based in Antwerp, Belgium. We are a product-focused company, building visualisation software for large time series datasets.

Our customers are top engineering teams that develop electrical planes (Lilium), design new electrical engines (Deepdrive) and make hyperloop a real thing in Europe (Hardt).

We recently raised a new round, and are hiring:

  • Backend engineer (mostly python & databases)
  • Customer success manager

https://www.marpledata.com/careers
